Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored the only goal of the match in the 29th minute
Others: Brazil struggled to create clear chances throughout the match
Ecuador applied a physically aggressive pressure high with three hardworking forwards
Brazil almost no room to get inside their box either
Brazil misplaced too many passes and struggled to connect up front
Brazil came back even worse in the second half
Vinicius Jr created their only shot on target in the second half
Rodrygo told Brazilian TV Globo that he was happy with the victory and to have scored
